## ShaderHelper.computeFogFactor() method

Computes the fog factor for a given view vector

**Signature:**

```typescript
static computeFogFactor(scope: PBInsideFunctionScope, viewDir: PBShaderExp, fogType: PBShaderExp, fogParams: PBShaderExp): PBShaderExp;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scope | [PBInsideFunctionScope](doc/markdown/./device.pbinsidefunctionscope.md) | Current shader scope |
|  viewDir | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) | the view vector |
|  fogType | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) | Type of the fog |
|  fogParams | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) | Fog parameters \[start, end, top, density\] |

**Returns:**

[PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md)

The computed fog factor
